main event: Police chief and 3 other men observed a UFO in the sky for 15 minutes on January 2, 1965.
interesting points: The UFO had a silvery, metallic exterior and lights around the edge.
The witnesses tried to get binoculars to get a closer look, but the UFO moved away.
The report also includes details of another UFO sighting on January 3, 1965, including the time, location, and movement of the object.
The report appears to be from a Project Blue Book document, indicating it was part of the U.S. government's official investigations into UFO sightings.
sighted object: a silvery, metallic UFO with lights around the edge
